title: The Zero Product Property
text: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.
speech: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.
pacedSpeech: The zero product property says if the product of two quantities is zero, it must be that at least one of the quantities is zero.

title: Factoring the Equation
text: We can factor $$7a^2+14a-7a=0$$ to use the zero product property. $$n^2-5n+6=7a^2+7a=a\left(7a+7\right)=0$$

title: Using the Zero Product Property
text: As per the zero product property, if $$a\left(7a+7\right)=0$$, then either a or $$7a+7$$ is equal to $$0$$. Setting both of these to $$0$$, we get $$a=0$$ or $$a=-1$$. Summing these values, we get $$-1$$.
speech: As per the zero product property, if  a, parentheses, 7 a plus 7,  is equal to 0 , then either a or  7 a, plus, 7  is equal to  0 . Setting both of these to  0 , we get  a is equal to 0  or  a, is equal to, negative 1 . Summing these values, we get  negative 1 .
